goal: Implement Field Station OS UI Phase 1 (MVP) - Mobile-first PWA with SSE detection feed

tasks.title: Project scaffolding: Vite + React 18 + TypeScript
tasks.description: Create new Vite project with React, TypeScript. Install dependencies: react-router-dom, @tanstack/react-query, vite-plugin-pwa. Configure vite.config.ts for PWA support.

tasks.title: Design system: CSS custom properties + typography
tasks.description: Create CSS variables for color palette (dark theme), load Google Fonts (DM Mono, Fraunces, Source Serif 4), set up base styles.

tasks.title: TypeScript types for API
tasks.description: Define interfaces: Detection, ClassifierConfig, SpeciesSummary, SystemResponse, TodaySummaryResponse. Create src/types/index.ts.

tasks.title: SSE hook with React Query integration
tasks.description: Implement useSSE hook that connects to /api/events, handles detection events, updates React Query cache, tracks connection state, handles deduplication.

tasks.title: App structure: Router + Tabs + Header
tasks.description: Set up React Router with 5 tabs (Live, Species, History, Stats, Settings). Create Header component with station name and connection indicator. Create placeholder screens.

tasks.title: Live Screen: Detection feed
tasks.description: Create DetectionCard component with species name, confidence bar, time, classifier badge. Implement virtualized reverse-chronological list. Wire to SSE via React Query.

tasks.title: Live Screen: Connection status indicator
tasks.description: Add pulsing dot in header (green/amber/red). Show reconnect/disconnect banners. Reflect EventSource readyState.

tasks.title: Species Screen: Today's species list
tasks.description: Fetch from /api/species/today. Display species rows with name, count, last seen, peak confidence. Implement sort options.

tasks.title: Error/Empty/Loading states
tasks.description: Add empty states ('No detections yet'), error states with retry buttons, loading skeletons for all implemented screens.

tasks.title: PWA manifest and icons
tasks.description: Create manifest.json with app name, colors, icons. Configure vite-plugin-pwa. Create placeholder icons (192x192, 512x512).
